title: Reinforcement Learning-Based Personalized Cancer Treatment Strategy Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and foundational data analysis comprehension
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning conducted outside work hours for corporate professionals.

learning_goals: One can describe the procedure for applying reinforcement learning (Q-learning) to clinical data.
Hands-on practice with Q-function approximation methods using Support Vector Regression (SVR) and Extremely Randomized Trees (ERT)
Application of personalized cancer treatment strategies considering delayed effects to clinical case data

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
